content: soot sprite throw pillow pattern difficulty beginner materials bernat blanket yarn black worsted weight yarn in pink/blue/yellow/white/black 6mm hook 4mm hook tapestry needle stitch markers poly-fil stuffing quilting pins optional abbreviations mc = magic_ring/magic_ring single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase put two stitches in the same space double_crochet = double_crochet st/sts = stitch/stitches slip_stitch = slip_stitch blo = back loop only the body portion is worked in the round so when you reach the end of the row do not chain one and start the new row mark the first stitch in the round with a stitch marker and continue to work the piece in the round the pattern body panels make two with your 6mm hook start by making a mc or chain 4 slip_stitch back to first chain chain 1 and put 6 single_crochet in the ring 6 r1 increase in every single_crochet 6x total 12 r2 increase in the first stitch and put one single_crochet in the next repeat 6x 18 r3 increase put 1 single_crochet in each of the next two sts repeat 24 r4 increase single_crochet in each of the next three sts repeat 30 r5 increase single_crochet in each of the next four sts repeat 36 r6 increase single_crochet in each of the next five sts repeat 42 r7 increase single_crochet in each of the next six sts repeat 48 r8 increase single_crochet in each of the next seven sts repeat 54 r9 increase put 1 single_crochet in each of the next two sts repeat until end of round r10 increase put 1 single_crochet in each of the next eleven sts repeat until end of round r11 increase put 1 single_crochet in each of the next twelve sts repeat r12-13 single_crochet around evenly when your first panel is complete slip_stitch to starting stitch in the row chain 1 cut yarn and tie off don t do this for the second panel because you will be securing them together with a single_crochet row with your working yarn eyes make two grab your 4mm hook and white worsted weight yarn and make a mc placing 6 single_crochet in the ring r1 increase 6x around 12 r2 increase single_crochet into the next st repeat 6x 18 r3 increase put one single_crochet in each of the next 2 sts repeat 24 r4 increase single_crochet in each of the next 3 sts repeat 30 r5 increase single_crochet in each of the next 4 sts repeat 36 r6 increase single_crochet in each of the next 5 sts repeat 42 leave a long tail for sewing cut yarn and tie off pupils make two black worsted yarn 4mm hook start with a mc and place 6sc in the mc increase 6x 12 cut yarn and tie off leaving a tail for sewing stars make 3 one in each color pink blue yellow 4mm hook begin with another mc and chain 1 in the mc put one single_crochet one double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet to make the first point of the star repeat
